BuildOption.description: BuildOption describes an optional deviation to a package build.

disabled.description: Optional: disable these linters that are not enabled by default.

environment.description: The specification for the packages build environment

pipeline.description: Required: The list of pipelines that produce the package.

subpackages.description: Optional: The list of subpackages that this package also produces.

data.description:
Optional: An arbitrary list of data that can be used via templating in the
pipeline

update.description: Optional: The update block determining how this package is auto updated

vars.description:
Optional: A map of arbitrary variables that can be used via templating in
the pipeline

var-transforms.description:
Optional: A list of transformations to create for the builtin template
variables

enable-prerelease-tags.description: Optional: Disables filtering of common pre-release tags

test.description: Test section for the main package.

ContentsOption.description: ContentsOption describes an optional deviation to an apko environment's contents block.

license.description: Required: The license for this package

license-path.description: Optional: Path to text of the custom License Ref

provider-priority.description:
Optional: An integer string compared against other equal package provides used to
determine priority of provides

replaces-priority.description:
Optional: An integer string compared against other equal package provides used to
determine priority of file replacements

EnvironmentOption.description: EnvironmentOption describes an optional deviation to an apko environment.

strip-prefix.description: If the version in GitHub contains a prefix which should be ignored

strip-suffix.description: If the version in GitHub contains a suffix which should be ignored

tag-filter.description:
Filter to apply when searching tags on a GitHub repository
Deprecated: Use TagFilterPrefix instead

tag-filter-prefix.description: Prefix filter to apply when searching tags on a GitHub repository

tag-filter-contains.description: Filter to apply when searching tags on a GitHub repository

use-tag.description:
Override the default of using a GitHub release to identify related tag to
fetch.  Not all projects use GitHub releases but just use tags

GitHubMonitor.description: GitHubMonitor indicates using the GitHub API

strip-prefix.description: StripPrefix is the prefix to strip from the version

strip-suffix.description: If the version in GitHub contains a suffix which should be ignored

tag-filter-prefix.description: Prefix filter to apply when searching tags on a GitHub repository

tag-filter-contains.description: Filter to apply when searching tags on a GitHub repository

description.description: Optional: The human readable description of the input

default.description: Optional: The default value of the input. Required when the input is.

required.description: Optional: A toggle denoting whether the input is required or not

ListOption.description: ListOption describes an optional deviation to a list, for example, a list of packages.

Packages.description: A list of packages needed by this pipeline

epoch.description: The monotone increasing epoch of the package

description.description: A human readable description of the package

url.description: The URL to the package's homepage

commit.description: Optional: The git commit of the package build configuration

target-architecture.description: List of target architectures for which this package should be build for

copyright.description: The list of copyrights for this package

dependencies.description: List of packages to depends on

options.description: Optional: Options that alter the packages behavior

scriptlets.description:
Optional: Executable scripts that run at various stages of the package
lifecycle, triggered by configurable events

checks.description: Optional: enabling, disabling, and configuration of build checks

timeout.description: Optional: The amount of time to allow this build to take before timing out.

resources.description: Optional: Resources to allocate to the build.

no-provides.description:
Optional: Signify this package as a virtual package which does not provide
any files, executables, libraries, etc... and is otherwise empty

no-depends.description:
Optional: Mark this package as a self contained package that does not
depend on any other package

no-commands.description: Optional: Mark this package as not providing any executables

name.description: Optional: A user defined name for the pipeline

uses.description:
Optional: A named reusable pipeline to run

This can be either a pipeline builtin to melange, or a user defined named pipeline.
For example, to use a builtin melange pipeline:
		uses: autoconf/make

with.description: Optional: Arguments passed to the reusable pipelines defined in `uses`

runs.description: Optional: The command to run using the builder's shell (/bin/sh)

pipeline.description:
Optional: The list of pipelines to run.

Each pipeline runs in it's own context that is not shared between other
pipelines. To share context between pipelines, nest a pipeline within an
existing pipeline. This can be useful when you wish to share common
configuration, such as an alternative `working-directory`.

inputs.description: Optional: A map of inputs to the pipeline

needs.description: Optional: Configuration to determine any explicit dependencies this pipeline may have

label.description: Optional: Labels to apply to the pipeline

if.description: Optional: A condition to evaluate before running the pipeline

assertions.description: Optional: Assertions to evaluate whether the pipeline was successful

working-directory.description:
Optional: The working directory of the pipeline

This defaults to the guests' build workspace (/home/build)

environment.description: Optional: environment variables to override the apko environment

required-steps.description:
The number (an int) of required steps that must complete successfully
within the asserted pipeline.

identifier.description: Required: ID number for release monitor

strip-prefix.description: If the version in release monitor contains a prefix which should be ignored

strip-suffix.description: If the version in release monitor contains a suffix which should be ignored

version-filter-contains.description: Filter to apply when searching version on a Release Monitoring

version-filter-prefix.description: Filter to apply when searching version Release Monitoring

ReleaseMonitor.description: ReleaseMonitor indicates using the API for https://release-monitoring.org/

reason.description: The reason scheduling is being used

Schedule.description: Schedule defines the schedule for the update check to run

trigger.description: Optional: A script to run on a custom trigger

pre-install.description:
Optional: The script to run pre install. The script should contain the
shebang interpreter.

post-install.description:
Optional: The script to run post install. The script should contain the
shebang interpreter.

pre-deinstall.description:
Optional: The script to run before uninstalling. The script should contain
the shebang interpreter.

post-deinstall.description:
Optional: The script to run after uninstalling. The script should contain
the shebang interpreter.

pre-upgrade.description:
Optional: The script to run before upgrading. The script should contain
the shebang interpreter.

post-upgrade.description:
Optional: The script to run after upgrading. The script should contain the
shebang interpreter.

if.description: Optional: A conditional statement to evaluate for the subpackage

range.description: Optional: The iterable used to generate multiple subpackages

pipeline.description: Optional: The list of pipelines that produce subpackage.

dependencies.description: Optional: List of packages to depend on

options.description: Optional: Options that alter the packages behavior

description.description: Optional: The human readable description of the subpackage

url.description: Optional: The URL to the package's homepage

commit.description: Optional: The git commit of the subpackage build configuration

checks.description: Optional: enabling, disabling, and configuration of build checks

environment.description:
Additional Environment necessary for test.
Environment.Contents.Packages automatically get
package.dependencies.runtime added to it. So, if your test needs
no additional packages, you can leave it blank.

pipeline.description: Required: The list of pipelines that test the produced package.

paths.description: Optional: The list of paths to monitor to trigger the script

manual.description:
Indicates that this package should be manually updated, usually taking
care over special version numbers

shared.description:
Indicate that an update to this package requires an epoch bump of
downstream dependencies, e.g. golang, java

version-separator.description: Override the version separator if it is nonstandard

ignore-regex-patterns.description: A slice of regex patterns to match an upstream version and ignore

release-monitor.description: The configuration block for updates tracked via release-monitoring.org

github.description: The configuration block for updates tracked via the Github API

git.description: The configuration block for updates tracked via Git

version-transform.description: The configuration block for transforming the `package.version` into an APK version

exclude-reason.description: ExcludeReason is required if enabled=false, to explain why updates are disabled.

schedule.description: Schedule defines the schedule for the update check to run

Update.description: Update provides information used to describe how to keep the package up to date

from.description:
Required: The original template variable.

Example: ${{package.version}}

match.description: Required: The regular expression to match against the `from` variable

replace.description: Required: The repl to replace on all `match` matches

to.description:
Required: The name of the new variable to create

Example: mangeled-package-version

match.description: Required: The regular expression to match against the `package.version` variable

replace.description: Required: The repl to replace on all `match` matches

VersionTransform.description: VersionTransform allows mapping the package version to an APK version
